title: Love Me, Love Me Not
description: Seventeen-year-old Hailey Brown has spent her whole life bouncing from foster home to foster home. All she wants is a safe, comfortable environment where she can finish school and move on her life. When Hailey gets placed with the Campbells, she thinks she’s died and gone to heaven. Suddenly she has clothes, money, warm meals, and a nice house. Mr. and Mrs. Campbell’s son Brad, a football player, couldn’t be friendlier.Soon, Hailey realizes her relationship with Brad has crossed the line from friendship to something more. But being with Brad would mean giving up the family she’s finally found. And there are people in Hailey’s past who don’t want to let her go—dangerous people who threaten the life she’s made herself at last.Can Hailey and Brad resist the passion that brings them together—or will they risk it all to be together?
author: S.M. Koz
